payment_messages_baseline.english:

payment_messages_baseline.zulu:
ğŸ¥³ Siyakwamukela kustadi sethu! Uma ukhetha ukujoyina, uzomenywa ukuqeda izinhlolovo ezi-3. 

ğŸŒ± Izinhlolovo zizokubuza imibuzo mayelana nempilo yakho nobudlelwano bakho nengane yakho. 

âœï¸ Emva kokuqeda inhlolovo yokuqala, uzothola i-airtime ka-R25. 

ğŸ’¬ Uzobe usumenywa ukuthola imilayezo kuWhatsApp eqhamuka kulenombolo ngobuzali nenhlanzeko. 

âœï¸ Emva kwenyanga uzocelwa ukuthi uqede inhlokovo yesibili, bese uzothola i-airtime ka-R50. 

âœï¸ Ezinyangeni ezintathu kamuva, uzothola inhlolovo yesi-3. Uzothola i-airtime ka-R75 ngemva kokuqeda leyo nhlolovo yokugcina. 

ğŸ“² Imali izothunyelwa kunombolo yefoni oyikhethayo njengemali noma i-airtime, kuya ngokuthi usebenzisa muphi u-opharetha weselula.

payment_messages_baseline.english: Please read this information carefully: https://bit.ly/satext_rct

âœï¸ You will receive R25 airtime for participating in this survey.

payment_messages_baseline.zulu:
âœï¸ Uzothola i-airtime ka-R25 ngokuhlanganyela kule nhlolovo. 

ğŸ“² Sizothumela i-airtime kunoma iyiphi inombolo yocingo yaseNingizimu Afrika oyikhethayo.

ğŸ’› Okokuqala, singathanda ukubuza imibizo embalwa mayelana nawe nomndeni wakho. Kubalulekile ukuthi ube neqiniso ukuze sikwazi ukusiza imindeni efana neyakho. 
  
ğŸ¤ Khumbula ukuthi igama lakho nezimpendulo zakho zizogcinwa zifihlekile. Uma kukhona imibuzo ongakhululekanga ukuyiphendula, asikho isidingo sokuthi uyiphendule.

payment_messages_baseline.zulu:
ğŸ¥³ Usuqedile ngenhlolovo! Siyabonga kakhulu ngokuhlanganyela kwakho. Njengophawu lokubonga, uzothola i-airtime ka-R25. 

ğŸ“… Sizolandela ngembuzo ecishe ifane emva kwenyanga eyodwa, futhi uma usuqede lolunhlolovo, uzothola i-airtime ka-R50 eyengeziwe. 

ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ ğŸ’› Umbono wakho uyigugu, uzosisiza ukuqondisisa kangcono ubunzima nezinto abazali baseNingizimu Afrika ababhekana nazo. Sibonga isikhathi sakho!

payment_messages_baseline.english: You can invite your family and friends to join the study and earn airtime, too! Just share this link with them: https://wa.me/27832838620/?text=study
payment_messages_baseline.zulu: Ungamema umndeni wakho noma abangani ukujoyina unhlolovo, nabo bathole i-airtime! Bathumelele lelinki kuphela: https://wa.me/27832838620/?text=study
